CINE_Statue_01.synopsis: Cinematic arena dialog to destroy a statue.
CINE_Statue_01.how_to_trigger: Go under S_GoblinPriestess_Statue_01_dc68d2e5-b526-424b-ad9a-316238a75f65 in WLD_Main_A, Start combat against S_GOB_GoblinPriest_b983c336-9a14-4e9b-adb9-4689e7e0afa9, in her turn, if a player character is alone under any of the statues, this dialog will be triggered.

automatic_ordering.reasoning: All four sessions (CINE_Statue_01, CINE_Statue_02, CINE_Statue_03, and CINE_Statue_04) involve a cinematic arena dialog that is triggered by destroying one of the statues located under a goblin priestess in the same area, using almost identical conditions. The triggering condition specifies that the dialog occurs when a player character is alone under any of the statues. This implies that if one of these dialogs is triggered (i.e., the player destroys one statue), the opportunity to trigger any of the other statue dialogs in the same encounter is effectively lost. Therefore, these sessions are mutually exclusive. There is no narrative or triggering information suggesting that one of these sessions necessarily happens before another in a sequential order.
